physical_examinations.vital_signs: Normal vital signs, BMI of 27 kg/m2
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: BMI increased to 30 kg/m2 despite lifestyle modification.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Transvaginal ultrasonography showed enlarged multi-follicular ovaries measuring 4.5 x 35.9 x 3.1 cm (right) and 7.1 x 33.5 x 36.6 cm (left)
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive bilateral ovarian enlargement noted over 2 years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Histological examination showed granulosa cell proliferation within antral follicles despite long-term GnRH analogue therapy
